page.title: 07Industry in E.Calder/Kn.
page.content: {EAST CALDER} We surveyed 137 children to find where their mothers and fathers work. {One third}worked in Edinburgh, a{sixth in East Calder, a{sixth}in Livingston, a{sixth}in West Lothian, and a{sixth in other places. {Employment in East Calder} CAMPS INDUSTRIAL ESTATE McBean,Chunky Chicks,Trivetts,2 scrap yards,Body Repair Shop,Milk Haulage, Ross Fencing.{ {Service Industries East Calder Garage,Jet Garage,Cafe, Library,Health Centre,shops,etc. {KIRKNEWTON Half of the fathers we surveyed worked in Kirknewton.Most of them work at Ritchie Army Camp and others at Kirknewton Station,Sawmill and the school.Other fathers work in Edinburgh and West Lothian. Justin and Barry
